1300590.name: Delivery
1300590.description:
Description

Your Mission is to Uncover the Truth!

The game’s events unfold in a province on the eastern edge of the country. Become a pilot for a local airline in a thrilling adventure where cargo delivery is just the beginning of a dangerous investigation. An archipelago, lost among eastern waters, holds dark secrets: the disappearance of a legendary pilot and a conspiracy that could endanger countless lives.

What Awaits You?

  • Freedom of Movement: Fly a plane over picturesque islands and navigate a truck through off-road terrain. Every delivery is a step closer to unraveling the mystery, and every island is a piece of the betrayal puzzle.

  • High-Stakes Investigation: Discover hidden caches of evidence, decode cryptic records, and evade pursuers.

  • Dangerous Revelations: Explore locations where every artifact brings you closer to the truth. What lies behind the number “731”?

Setting:

An archipelago, with a story set around the early 2000s. This place is almost completely isolated from major cities, reliant on cargo plane pilots for survival. After the August 31 1986 incident involving two water vessels, severe water pollution led to a ban on maritime travel and cargo transport. The salvation of the archipelago came from a pilot of a private airline—whose disappearance you must now investigate.

“Delivery” - is not just about cargo delivery. It’s a flight into the heart of a conspiracy, where your piloting mastery and driving skills will decide the fate of many.

Will you uncover the mystery… before you vanish yourself?
